ingredients.ingredient: 1 (13 ounce) package smoked sausage, cut into 1/2-inch slices
1 (16 ounce) package bacon slices, halved crosswise

cookingTips: Spray baking sheet with cooking spray to prevent sticking
Use toothpicks to secure bacon around sausage slices for easy handling
Bake at 400Â°F for 20-25 minutes, sprinkling brown sugar halfway through for caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the assembly process and explain the sweet-savory flavor combination from brown sugar caramelization.
